message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a high-quality item that we believe would greatly benefit you. Considering its value and features, I'm proposing a price of $150 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and budget.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but I'm currently looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I must maintain the integrity of our product's value. I am willing to negotiate further, so I am counteroffering at $125 for the product. This price reflects the quality and benefits it offers. I hope this aligns better with your current budget.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110 for the product.

I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a counteroffer of $115 for the product. This price takes into account both the value of the item and your budgetary considerations. I believe this is a fair compromise that allows us to move forward with the transaction.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110 for the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your budgetary constraints. After reviewing the situation, I am willing to offer the product at $112.50. This price reflects the quality of the product while still being mindful of your financial considerations. I hope this proposal is more acceptable and allows us to reach an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110 for the product.

Considering your persistent efforts to find a suitable price for the product, I am willing to accept a final counteroffer of $112 for the item. This price acknowledges the value of the product while also taking into account your budgetary concerns. I believe this is a fair compromise that will allow us to conclude our negotiations.
